## QueryIndices.add() method

Add a value to the set of Indices used to filter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add(value: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string | A Index as string. |
